title: Does Demolish (tower-crushing rune) stack?
body: Is it possible to proc multiple Demolishes at the same time? If yes, then people could just insta run down mid (bot better) as 5 on level 1 and take a lot of hp down from the tower.

replies.body: It doesn't look like it to me, as soon as one demolish procs all the boxes disappear and it counts as if they all go on cooldown, although maybe you could go in 1 at a time?

> [{quoted}](name=FullMetaIchemist,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=11QVmFgp,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-09T19:54:18.822+0000)
>
> It doesn't look like it to me, as soon as one demolish procs all the boxes disappear and it counts as if they all go on cooldown, although maybe you could go in 1 at a time?

No the visual indicator is just Bugged

so you're saying they DO proc together?

5 demolish together sounds op as fuck
well demolish isn't very effective on non-tanks, so sure you'd be able to take towers but you wouldn't have any damage for pvp
